meta.title: Get in Touch | Veblabs
meta.description: Contact Veblabs for expert web development, design, and digital solutions. We're here to help bring your vision to life.

hero.title: Let's Build Something Amazing Together
hero.description: Have a project in mind? We'd love to hear about it. Tell us what you're looking for and we'll help you achieve it.

response.title: Quick Response Time
response.description: We respond to all inquiries within 24 hours. Your time is valuable, and we respect that.

support.title: Dedicated Support
support.description: Get personalized attention from our expert team throughout your project journey.

team.title: Expert Team
team.description: Work with skilled professionals who bring years of experience to your project.

form.title: Start Your Project
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
form.name: Name
form.success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.
form.error: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.
